item.title: Contributing to Open Source Go projects on GitHub - A recipe to clone forked Go repositories
item.description: This post was originally published on my Dev.to profile : Contributing to Open Source Go projects on GitHub — A recipe to clone forked Go repos. Phew! It took me a while to figure out the entire process so I decided to write this post and I hope it’ll further help everyone else get started. I managed to gather all the ingredients and curate the recipe to start working on an open source Golang project…so follow along.
